==@@id="2_Tipwidget"@@~Tip widget==


~This module implement a <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|display>> function which actually display a tip
    ~(i~.e~. a box over the page content~)~.


    ~It appends an element ~(which is called here "the filter"~) to body~. ~The filter is
    meant take the whole page space~, in order to capture clicks to close the tip~.
    ~The filter also contains another element~, called the menu which is the container
    for content to be displayed~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|filter~_a>>~: filter attributes default is <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| a~_class ~["ot~-drp~-filter"~] >>
    and will be overriden if you provide this argument~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|menu~_a>>~: menu attributes default is <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~[ a~_class ~["ot~-drp~-menu"~] ~] >>
    and will be overriden if you provide this argument~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|side>>~: specify how the tip whould be positioned with respect to
    the <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|origin>> element~. ~By default~, the tip is centered~; if it would
    not fit on screen~, its right hand side or left hand side is aligned
    with the middle of the <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|origin>> element~. ~When side is <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|`~Left>> or
    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|`~Right>>~, the tip and the <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|origin>> element are aligned on the
    right ~(resp~. the left~)~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|origin>> is the element from which the tip is supposed to pop out~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|onopen filter menu side>> is called after the filter is append to body~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|onclose filter menu side>> is called after the tip has been closed~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|content>> is the function generating the main content~. ~It takes the function
    to close the tip as parameter
